title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 302 - Optional Membership For Provisional Or Temporary Appointees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 302 - Optional Membership For Provisional Or Temporary Appointees

State Regulations
§ 302.1 - Non-member provisional or temporary appointees
§ 302.2 - Credit for service as a provisional or temporary appointee to be applied on membership

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 302

Statutory authority: Civil Service Law, §54; Retirement and

Social Security Law, §§11, 311

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
